title: A Quiet Place in the country
creator_credit: New Zealand National Film Unit, David H. Fowler and David Sims
brief_description: A historic and reminiscent view of the Otawa Farm - a 500 acre house/farm located in Hawlles Bay, New Zealand, and owned by Ronald Stewart.
